jd: From: Vicky Kumar, Altitude Technology Solutions v.kumar@atsitinc.com Reply to: v.kumar@atsitinc.com Full Stack .Net Lead contract Skill - .Net with Angular & React including database SQL & DB2Exp should me 10 to 14 yr exp (not more than 10 to 14 yr) Job Description:5+ years of experience of the following:You should have a firm understanding of data structures and how they translate to code.You should know how to make REST API calls from client-side code and process JSON results.Build RESTful APIs for deployment on Azure app services.Creating CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOpsBuilding robust Azure solutions using technologies such as Function Apps, Data - Factory, Service, BusDesigning SQL structures and writing SQL code such as stored procedures, functions, custom data typesWorking in multi-developer teams using Azure DevOpsManaging source code via Git, with a familiarity of GitFlow.Mentoring junior team membersBuilding web parts/components for CMS platforms like SharePoint, SiteCore, or Adobe CMS.SharePoint administration Duties ## What you'll be doing5+ years of experience of the following:You should have a firm understanding of data structures and how they translate to code.You should know how to make REST API calls from client-side code and process JSON results.Build RESTful APIs for deployment on Azure app services.Creating CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOpsBuilding robust Azure solutions using technologies such as Function Apps, Data - Factory, Service, BusDesigning SQL structures and writing SQL code such as stored procedures, functions, custom data typesWorking in multi-developer teams using Azure DevOpsManaging source code via Git, with a familiarity of GitFlow.Mentoring junior team membersBuilding web parts/components for CMS platforms like SharePoint, SiteCore, or Adobe CMS.SharePoint administration Thanks and Regards, Vicky KumarAltitude Technology Solutions Inc|www.atsitinc.comE-mail : V.kumar@atsitinc.com
